items.content_html: A lightweight and simple task timer to help you track time and boost productivity. Designed for developers and productivity enthusiasts, this project is featured in a YouTube tutorial. Easy to use and minimalistic. Check it out and stay on track!
items.title: dimasabimanyy/task-tracker: A lightweight and simple task timer to help you track time and boost productivity. Designed for developers and productivity enthusiasts, this project is featured in a YouTube tutorial. Easy to use and minimalistic. Check it out and stay on track!

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.
items.title: Kimforee/FeryAPI: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.

items.content_html: An Employee Management System built as a lightweight application where data is managed using the browser's local Storage as a database. This system provides a simple and effective way to handle employee records without the need for a backend server or external database.
items.title: Ayush4158/Employee-Management-System-ReactJS-Localstorage: An Employee Management System built as a lightweight application where data is managed using the browser's local Storage as a database. This system provides a simple and effective way to handle employee records without the need for a backend server or external database.

items.content_html: A lightweight shopping cart application built with React and Vite. Features real-time cart updates and responsive design. Built using modern React practices including Context API for state management and CSS Modules for styling.
items.title: 27ahmad/react-ecommerce-cart: A lightweight shopping cart application built with React and Vite. Features real-time cart updates and responsive design. Built using modern React practices including Context API for state management and CSS Modules for styling.

items.content_html: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
